body:
Day 55 - 1343*
So that child is a god? Why is she in school, exactly? She could just desire anything and it should happen, since she was shown here to be able to destroy reality. Also, h8GW, that's worse. A world of demi humans, eww.
1/10.
this is where it all started. The first smegma manga ever translated (at least on this site)
(DONT READ!!) you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
Well, it got replaced by a harem world where everyone's a bunny girl, so it's all good.
